name: Action Saxton
description:
Action Saxton! Hero of the Australias!
Our nations supply of Australium has been stolen by some folks in robes and sludge monsters! Infiltrate their lair and use your boomerang to subdue their forces as you attempt to locate our nations most valuable resource!

Features:
-1 excitingly small Level! (it has walls!)
- 2 different enemy types (Ranged AND Melee)!
- Full Boomerang action (It comes back after you throw it!)
- Invisible Fists! (I didn't make a sprite for them! Oops!)
- Almost no animation (The boomerang spins, that is literally it!)
